      • initOutlets

        public static void initOutlets(MyOwnJFrame mainWindow,
                               javax.swing.JButton playButton,
                               javax.swing.JList listSongs,
                               javax.swing.JLabel songInfo,
                               javax.swing.JCheckBoxMenuItem repeatSong,
                               javax.swing.JLabel repeatSongIcon,
                               javax.swing.JCheckBoxMenuItem repeatSongsFromTheBeginning,
                               javax.swing.JMenuItem playOrPauseText)
        Method to init the outlets
        Parameters:
        mainWindow -
        playButton - The play button in the GUI
        listSongs - The JList with the list of the songs
        songInfo - The JLabel with the song's information
        repeatSong - The JCheckBoxMenuItem to repeat a song
        repeatSongIcon - The JLabel with the icon for the repeat song action
        repeatSongsFromTheBeginning - The JCheckBoxMenuItem to repeat all songs from the beginning
        playOrPauseText - The JMenuItem with the "Play" or "Pause" text
        Since:
        JMusic 1.0.0
